item.title: CVE-2024-8260|2024-08-30T12:22:45.964Z -- styra -- opa
item.description: A SMB force-authentication vulnerability exists in all versions of OPA for Windows prior to v0.68.0. The vulnerability exists because of improper input validation, allowing a user to pass an arbitrary SMB share instead of a Rego file as an argument to OPA CLI or to one of the OPA Go libraryâ€™s functions.
